scenarios.label: Baseline / Recommended
scenarios.description: 500 on-prem/VM servers protected with Azure Backup MARS agent to a Recovery Services vault, plus a specialized ND96asr_v4 GPU VM in a rare region.

resources.notes: Single Recovery Services vault for 500 MARS-protected servers. Assumes ~400 GB protected per server on average with 30-day retention, giving ~200 TB effective backup storage (locally redundant). Includes backup metadata and operations overhead. No cross-region DR for backup vault in this baseline.
resources.meter_name: ADLS Gen2 Vaulted LRS Write Operations

ADLS Gen2 Vaulted GRS Write Operations

resources.notes: Logical representation of 500 protected instances using Azure Backup MARS agent. Azure Backup pricing is per protected instance tier plus consumed backup storage in the vault.

Specialized GPU VM ND96asr_v4 in a rare region (example: eastus; adjust to actual supported region). Assumes full-time usage for AI training/inference. Egress estimate 2 TB/month for data/model transfers.
Premium SSD OS disk for ND96asr_v4 VM, assumed 512 GB, locally redundant. IOPS/throughput are approximate for sizing.

resources.notes: Log Analytics workspace for Azure Backup reporting and GPU VM monitoring. Assumes ~500 GB/month ingestion with default retention.
Key Vault for storing backup credentials, certificates, and GPU VM secrets. Standard tier, moderate operation volume.

scenarios.label: Cost Optimized
scenarios.description: Reduced backup retention and storage for 500 MARS servers and part-time ND96asr_v4 GPU VM usage to lower costs.

resources.notes: Recovery Services vault with shorter retention (e.g., 7â€“14 days) and/or more aggressive pruning, assuming ~160 GB effective backup per server on average (~80 TB total). LRS storage.
resources.meter_name: ADLS Gen2 Vaulted LRS Write Operations

sku_candidates.meter_name: ADLS Gen2 Vaulted LRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted ZRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted RA-GRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted GRS Write Operations

resources.notes: Same 500 protected instances with MARS agent; cost optimization is via reduced retention and storage, not fewer instances.
Same ND96asr_v4 SKU but used only ~160 hours/month (e.g., 1 week of intensive training or a few hours per day). Lower egress at ~500 GB/month.
Smaller 256 GB Premium SSD OS disk to reduce storage cost while keeping performance acceptable.

scenarios.label: High Performance / High Resilience
scenarios.description: 500 MARS servers with higher retention and GRS backup storage plus continuously running ND96asr_v4 GPU VM with high-performance disks and higher egress.

resources.notes: Recovery Services vault with longer retention (e.g., 90+ days, weekly/monthly backups) and geo-redundant storage (GRS). Assumes ~600 GB effective backup per server on average (~300 TB total).
resources.meter_name: ADLS Gen2 Vaulted LRS Write Operations

sku_candidates.meter_name: ADLS Gen2 Vaulted LRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted ZRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted RA-GRS Write Operations
ADLS Gen2 Vaulted GRS Write Operations

resources.notes: Same 500 MARS-protected servers; high-performance scenario focuses on higher retention and GRS for resilience.
Two ND96asr_v4 VMs running 24x7 for parallel high-performance AI training/inference. Egress estimated at 5 TB/month across both VMs.
Larger 1 TB Premium SSD OS disks per GPU VM for high-performance workloads and local datasets.
